column3:
ACK from me.

RE: adding a few minutes to the test time: I think we should start with more testing at every PR; we can optimize or do a run-expensive-tests-against-git-HEAD-once-a-day if it becomes too much.
ACK from me too, it's better to catch problems before merge\n
Ok. I picked the current ones (wallet/listtransactions/forknotify) because they were the ones listed for the old pull-tester. Are there any others that should be hooked up initially?\n
No, this is fine. Others can be added later.\n
